description: Thinking about joining a crew, but know not how to pirate-speak? You wouldn't want to be at rope's end for accidentally calling the captain a landlubber, would ye? Well then, me hearties, put down yer pint of grog, sheathe yer cutlass, and add the Pirate's Dictionary to yer Alexa! Ye may ask the dictionary for a specific word ("what are the Pieces of Eight?" or "define scallywag"), a random word ("give me a random word"), or to list all words ("list all words"). You'll be a scourge of the Seven Seas in no time!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, open Pirates Dictionary and tell me what a Jolly Roger is.
name: Pirate's Dictionary
shortDescription: Pirate's Dictionary - A must-have for all ye sea marauders.
